address: Hàn River, Đà Nẵng, 越南
content:
Explore the beautiful coastal city of Da Nang and the ancient town of Hoi An with tickets to visit tourist attractions: Ba Na Hills, Mikazuki, and Hoi An Memories showEnjoy 4 seasons on the same day at Ba Na Hills - a fairy scene on the top of Chua mountain, check-in the Golden Bridge, French Village; explore the cultural and spiritual architectural works hereEnjoy the real scene show Hoi An Memories - a program that combines sound, light, and traditional dance tunes to tell the story of the more than 400-year history of Hoi An ancient townRelax and regenerate energy after days of fun and relaxation at Mikazuki Water Park & Onsen =

Travel around Da Nang with super-saving Da Nang Traveloka Pass, combo tickets to visit Ba Na Hills tourist area, Than Tai Mountain Hot Spring Park, and enjoy the scenography show Hoi An Memories. Coming to Da Nang, Hoi An, you definitely cannot miss the following 03 places: - **Ba Na Hills, Da Nang** is no longer a new place for tourists. This is the most luxurious resort complex combined with entertainment in Vietnam, known as the "fairytale place" in the heart of the world. Ba Na Hills owns a wonderful climate and amazing natural landscapes, giving visitors the experience of 4 seasons in 1 day! - **Than Tai Hot Springs Park:** Nestled in the Ba Na - Nui Chua nature reserve, with a terrain of many caves and hills, and underground water with natural hot mineral sources, mineral springs Than Tai hot spot is one of the resorts and resorts in Da Nang chosen by many tourists as a place to relax after days of fun. - **Hoi An Memories Show:** Hoi An Memories is an outdoor show with bold ethnic, cultural, and human nuances in Hoi An ancient town. This is considered one of the largest art shows in Vietnam, with more than 500 artists performing on an outdoor stage in traditional Ao Dai costumes and modern staging techniques combined with sound and light. **Exclusive Deal on Traveloka:** free 1-hour Coconut Forest basket boat ride when you buy Hoi An Memories Show ECO ticket session.

The reality show Hoi An Memories is located in Hoi An Impression Theme Park, you should visit the park before the show starts

Golden Bridge, Ba Na Hills - one of the hottest check-in places in Ba Na, besides, Ba Na Hills also has many outstanding places such as French Village, Le Jardin D'amour flower garden

Hoi An Memories is staged with the common language of music, a harmonious combination of sound, light, dance, and folk melodies.

Hoi An Impressionist Park recreates the history of the formation and development of Hoi town from 400 years ago with temples, pagodas, shrines, etc.
